author.title: Author(s)
author.text:
Coded with ♥ by Emmanuel Béziat (GitHub / Twitter).
Feel free to tell me what you think of this app!

privacy.title: Privacy & datas
privacy.text: ParkourFinder doesn’t collect any information about you, and doesn’t use any unwanted tracking service. No data will be sent to Google, Facebook and co.

Search.placeholder: Search for a city, a country…

success.title: Add a new spot
success.description: Geolocation is enabled. You can add a new spot right where you’re standing!

error.title: Add a new spot
error.description: Geolocation is disabled. You can add a new spot by pinning it manually on the map.

action.title: Remove a spot
action.text: You’re about to permanently remove a spot. This action can’t be undone. Please use this function carefully.

success.title: It’s done!
success.text: The spot has been successfully removed.

success.title: Spot edited!
success.text: The informations of this spot have been successfully edited.

error.title: An error occured
error.text: Unable to edit the informations of this spot.

pictures.title: Send pictures
pictures.text: Send pictures of the spot so other tracers can see what it has to offer.
pictures.upload_max: You can’t upload more than 4 images at once.
pictures.files_max: Each spot can have a maximum than 4 images.

error.title: Error!
error.text: The requested action couldn’t be done. If this issue persists, please report it.
